target.name: init
target.description: initializes build process

target.name: compile.jmi.if
target.description: compiles JMI interfaces generated for (meta-)model access

target.name: jar.jmi.if
target.description: packs compiled JMI interfaces into a jar file

target.name: compile.jmi.impl
target.description: compiles JMI implementation classes for MOF-OCL and UML-OCL

target.name: jar.jmi.impl
target.description: packs compiled JMI implementation classes into a jar file

target.name: compile.ocl20stdlib
target.description: compiles JMI-backed OCL2.0 Standard Library

target.name: jar.ocl20stdlib
target.description: packs compiled JMI-backed OCL2.0 Standard library into a jar file

target.name: javadoc
target.description: generates javadoc API documentation

target.name: codegen.sablecc-ext.uptodate
target.description: checks whether extended SableCC parser code is up to date

target.name: codegen.sablecc-ext
target.description: generates grammar file parser source code for extended SableCC parser generator

target.name: compile.sablecc-ext
target.description: compiles extended SableCC parser generator

target.name: jar.sablecc.extended
target.description: packs compiled SableCC-Extended into a jar file

target.name: taskdef.sablecc-ext
target.description: defines an ant task to call the extended SableCC parser generator

target.name: codegen.sableparser.uptodate
target.description: checks whether the OCL20 parser code generated by SableCC-extended is up to date

target.name: compile.sableparser.astnode
target.description: Compiles the library of (additional) syntax tree nodes for the OCL2.0 parser's attribute evaluator

target.name: jar.sableparser.astnode
target.description: packs the library of (additional) syntax tree nodes for the OCL2.0 parser's attribute evaluator into a jar file

target.name: codegen.sableparser
target.description: generate the OCL2.0 parser skeleton using SableCC-extended

target.name: compile.sableparser
target.description: compile the OCL2.0 parser skeleton generated by SableCC-extended

target.name: jar.sableparser
target.description: packs basic OCL20 parser components (AST library, lexer, parser) into a jar file

target.name: compile.parsertools
target.description: compile the OCL2.0 parser tools

target.name: jar.parsertools
target.description: packs the OCL2.0 parser tools into a jar file

target.name: run.parser-gui
target.description: runs the OCL2.0 parser GUI

target.name: run.parser-cli
target.description: runs the OCL2.0 parser CLI

target.name: compile.ocl22sql
target.description: compile the OCL22SQL tool

target.name: jar.ocl22sql
target.description: packs the OCL22SQL tool into a jar file

target.name: run.ocl22sql
target.description: runs the OCL22SQL tool

target.name: compile.ocl20repository
target.description: compiles the MDR integration and initialization code

target.name: jar.ocl20repository
target.description: packs components for OCL20 basic support (lib, MDR integration) into a jar file

target.name: init.mdr.uptodate
target.description: checks whether the Meta-Data Repository (MDR) is correctly initialized

target.name: init.mdr
target.description: initializes the Meta-Data Repository (MDR)

target.name: compile.oclscript
target.description: Compiles the OclScript runner

target.name: jar.oclscript
target.description: packs the OclScript runner into a jar file

target.name: run.oclscript
target.description: runs the OclScript runner utility
target.echo: This target does not work. The OclScriptRunner.java source file
is incompatible with the current version of OclModelHelper.java

target.name: compile.codegen.java
target.description: Compiles the Java code generator runner

target.name: jar.codegen.java
target.description: packs the Java code generator into a jar file

target.name: compile.workbench
target.description: Compiles the OCL2.0 workbench

target.name: jar.workbench
target.description: packs the OCL2.0 workbench into a jar file

target.name: run.workbench
target.description: runs the OCL2.0 workbench

target.name: compile.utilityexample
target.description: Compiles the classes Utility and UtilityTest

target.name: jar.utilityexample
target.description: packs the Utility Example into a jar file

target.name: run.utilityexample
target.description: Runs the Class UtilityTest

target.name: dist
target.description: Creates a binary and a source distribution package

target.name: clean
target.description: Clean all build products.

target.name: help.about
target.description: Short introduction to the project
target.echo:
Welcome to the Dresden OCL Toolkit. This toolkit is comprised of ...
More info goes here.

target.name: compile
target.description: compiles all compile-targets

target.name: jar
target.description: creates all jar-files
